definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Hefei, capital of Anhui Province 安徽省[An1 hui1 Sheng3] in south central China
Hefei, capital of Anhui Province 安徽省[An1 hui1 Sheng3] in south central China
fat (e.g. pork fat)/fatty meat/(fig.) a gold mine/cash cow
Feidong county in Hefei 合肥[He2 fei2], Anhui
Feixi county in Hefei 合肥[He2 fei2], Anhui

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 这片土壤太贫瘠了，想整个儿施一通肥。

sentences.english: The soil here is quite fertile.
Ammonia gas released byfertilizefertilized cropland is a cause of air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 被施过肥的农田释放的氨气是空气污染的原因之一。

sentences.english: Baby fat removal had no effect.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿肥去除没有效果的。

sentences.english: Fried mutton fat with onions goes well with vodka.
sentences.chinese: 油炸肥羊肉伴洋葱，再加上一杯伏特加就是绝配了。

sentences.english: A moment on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.
sentences.chinese: 要知道“一时嘴贪，一世肥臀”。

sentences.english: Made from cellulose, this shrink-wrap decomposes in a few weeks in a compost rubbish or in an industrial composter .
sentences.chinese: 由纤维素，这拆封分解在数周或垃圾堆肥在工业堆肥。

sentences.english: After pruning, apply a rose fertiliser and mulch.
sentences.chinese: 修剪后施玫瑰花肥，培土。

sentences.english: A fat sow was grubbing about near the gate and refused to move out of our way.
sentences.chinese: 一只肥母猪在大门口拱来拱去，不肯给我们让路。

sentences.english: The organic matter content of oversized compost in screen was higher than that of undersized compost in the maturity compost.
sentences.chinese: 腐熟垃圾堆肥筛分后的筛上物有机物含量高于筛下物。

sentences.english: The struvite can be made as the controlled release fertilizer, which has good economic benefit.
sentences.chinese: 作为缓释肥，具有良好的经济效益。

sentences.english: The clothes fit Siggard almost perfectly, the only problem being that the trousers were slightly overlarge.
sentences.chinese: 衣服很合身，唯一的问题是裤子有点肥。

sentences.english: Liquid fertilizer sources can be sprayed on the turf or fertigated at label rates.
sentences.chinese: 液体肥用于草坪叶面喷施或按商标说明灌施。

sentences.english: The lambs must be made off fat early in summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏时必须把羊羔喂肥以便出售。

sentences.english: Finally, give that sweet ass a smack and rub it better.
sentences.chinese: 最后拍打她的肥臀，更猛烈地摩擦。

definition: thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
fat (e.g. pork fat)/fatty meat/(fig.) a gold mine/cash cow
